title: 755 9 "Garchu! The Straw Hats Reunite!"Transliteration: "Garuchū! Mugiwara no Ichimi Sai Shūketsu" (Japanese:ガルチュー！麦わらの一味再集結) Masahiro Hosoda Tomohiro Nakayama September 4, 2016(2016-09-04) December 7, 2025
transformers_text: 755 9 Garc hu The Straw Hats Reunite Transliteration Garu ch Mugi war a no Ichi mi Sai Sh ke tsu Japanese Masahiro Ho soda Tomohiro Nakayama September 4 2016 2016 09 04 December 7 2025 Zuni sha the elephant that carries Zo u on its back spouts water on to Zo u throwing the Straw Hats into chaos Meanwhile Kin ' em on Kan j uro and the monkey mink attempt to climb back up to Zo u but the water causes them to fall off again Luffy Wanda and Carrot reunite with Law and the rest of the Straw Hats and head to the Right Belly Fortress where they receive an unexpectedly friendly welcome from the minks They then reunite with Nami and Chopper but Nami starts crying as she begins to reveal something about Sanji
